statements: SELECT * FROM helpdesk_support;
SELECT request_id, request_description FROM helpdesk_support;
SELECT * FROM helpdesk_support WHERE request_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM helpdesk_support WHERE request_priority = 'Urgent';
SELECT assigned_support_agent, created_at FROM helpdesk_support;
SELECT request_id, request_description, request_status FROM helpdesk_support WHERE request_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM helpdesk_support WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM helpdesk_support WHERE assigned_support_agent LIKE '%John%';
SELECT COUNT(request_id) AS total_requests FROM helpdesk_support;
SELECT assigned_support_agent, COUNT(request_id) AS total_requests FROM helpdesk_support GROUP BY assigned_support_agent;
SELECT MIN(created_at) AS earliest_request FROM helpdesk_support;
SELECT MAX(created_at) AS latest_request FROM helpdesk_support;
SELECT AVG(DATE_PART('day', AGE(NOW(), created_at))) AS average_age_of_requests FROM helpdesk_support;
SELECT * FROM helpdesk_support ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM helpdesk_support ORDER BY request_priority DESC, created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM helpdesk_support LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_requests FROM helpdesk_support WHERE request_status = 'Closed';
SELECT AVG(DATE_PART('hour', AGE(NOW(), created_at))) AS average_response_time FROM helpdesk_support WHERE request_status = 'Open';
SELECT request_id, request_description, request_priority FROM helpdesk_support WHERE request_priority = 'High';
SELECT assigned_support_agent, COUNT(request_id) AS total_requests FROM helpdesk_support WHERE request_status = 'Open' GROUP BY assigned_support_agent;
SELECT * FROM helpdesk_support WHERE request_status='Open' AND request_priority='High';
SELECT request_id, request_description, assigned_support_agent FROM helpdesk_support WHERE request_priority='Medium';
SELECT DISTINCT request_status FROM helpdesk_support;
SELECT request_id, request_description FROM helpdesk_support WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(request_id) as total_requests FROM helpdesk_support WHERE request_status='Open';
SELECT AVG(request_id) as avg_request_id FROM helpdesk_support;
SELECT * FROM helpdesk_support WHERE assigned_support_agent LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM helpdesk_support WHERE request_status='Closed' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT assigned_support_agent, COUNT(*) as total_requests_assigned FROM helpdesk_support GROUP BY assigned_support_agent;
SELECT request_priority, COUNT(*) as priority_count FROM helpdesk_support GROUP BY request_priority HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT MAX(created_at) as latest_request_date FROM helpdesk_support;
SELECT MIN(created_at) as oldest_request_date FROM helpdesk_support;
SELECT request_status, COUNT(*) as status_count FROM helpdesk_support GROUP BY request_status ORDER BY status_count DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT assigned_support_agent) as total_agents FROM helpdesk_support;
SELECT request_id, request_description, created_at FROM helpdesk_support WHERE DATE(created_at) = '2022-08-15';
SELECT * FROM helpdesk_support WHERE request_status IN ('Open', 'Pending') AND request_priority='High';
SELECT * FROM helpdesk_support WHERE request_status='Open' UNION SELECT * FROM helpdesk_support WHERE request_status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM helpdesk_support WHERE assigned_support_agent IS NULL;
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(DAY FROM AGE(created_at))) as avg_request_age_in_days FROM helpdesk_support;
SELECT request_id, request_priority, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM created_at) as request_month FROM helpdesk_support ORDER BY request_month;
SELECT * FROM service_requests;
SELECT request_id, customer_id FROM service_requests;
SELECT request_id, request_description, request_date FROM service_requests;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, request_id FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, assignee_id, ticket_date FROM tickets;
SELECT request_id, customer_id, request_description, request_date FROM service_requests WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT request_id, customer_id, request_description, request_date FROM service_requests WHERE request_id = 10;
SELECT ticket_id, request_id, ticket_status, assignee_id, ticket_date FROM tickets WHERE assignee_id = 3;
SELECT ticket_id, request_id, ticket_status, assignee_id, ticket_date FROM tickets WHERE request_id = 15;
SELECT * FROM service_requests WHERE request_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_date < '2022-07-01';
SELECT request_id, customer_id, request_description, request_date FROM service_requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT request_id, customer_id, request_description, request_date FROM service_requests ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(request_id) FROM service_requests;
SELECT MIN(request_id) FROM service_requests;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM service_requests;
SELECT request_id, COUNT(ticket_id) as num_tickets FROM service_requests LEFT JOIN tickets ON service_requests.request_id = tickets.request_id GROUP BY request_id;
SELECT DISTINCT assignee_id FROM tickets;

SELECT request_id, customer_id, COUNT(ticket_id) as num_tickets FROM service_requests LEFT JOIN tickets ON service_requests.request_id = tickets.request_id GROUP BY request_id HAVING num_tickets >= 3;
SELECT * FROM service_requests WHERE request_id = 1;
SELECT request_id, customer_id, request_description FROM service_requests WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT request_id, ticket_status, assignee_id FROM tickets WHERE ticket_id = 10;
SELECT sr.request_id, sr.request_description, t.ticket_date FROM service_requests sr JOIN tickets t ON sr.request_id = t.request_id;
SELECT sr.customer_id, t.assignee_id, t.ticket_status FROM service_requests sr JOIN tickets t ON sr.request_id = t.request_id WHERE sr.customer_id = t.assignee_id;
SELECT sr.request_date, t.ticket_date FROM service_requests sr JOIN tickets t ON sr.request_id = t.request_id WHERE sr.request_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sr.customer_id, COUNT(t.ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM service_requests sr JOIN tickets t ON sr.request_id = t.request_id GROUP BY sr.customer_id;
SELECT sr.request_id, sr.request_description, t.ticket_status, t.assignee_id FROM service_requests sr LEFT JOIN tickets t ON sr.request_id = t.request_id;
SELECT * FROM service_requests sr INNER JOIN tickets t ON sr.request_id = t.request_id WHERE sr.customer_id = 100 AND t.assignee_id = 50;
SELECT MAX(t.ticket_date) AS last_ticket_date FROM tickets t;

SELECT AVG(DATE_PART('day', NOW()::timestamp - sr.request_date)) AS average_request_completion_time FROM service_requests sr JOIN tickets t ON sr.request_id = t.request_id WHERE t.ticket_status = 'Closed';
SELECT DISTINCT sr.customer_id FROM service_requests sr JOIN tickets t ON sr.request_id = t.request_id WHERE t.ticket_status = 'Open';

SELECT sr.request_id, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM sr.request_date) AS request_month, COUNT(t.ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM service_requests sr JOIN tickets t ON sr.request_id = t.request_id GROUP BY sr.request_id, request_month;
SELECT sr.request_id, sr.request_description, t.ticket_status, t.assignee_id FROM service_requests sr JOIN tickets t ON sr.request_id = t.request_id ORDER BY sr.request_date DESC;
SELECT sr.customer_id, AVG(DATE_PART('day', t.ticket_date - sr.request_date)) AS avg_completion_time FROM service_requests sr JOIN tickets t ON sr.request_id = t.request_id GROUP BY sr.customer_id;

SELECT sr.request_id, sr.request_description, COUNT(t.ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM service_requests sr LEFT JOIN tickets t ON sr.request_id = t.request_id GROUP BY sr.request_id, sr.request_description HAVING COUNT(t.ticket_id) >= 2;

SELECT sr.customer_id, CASE WHEN COUNT(t.ticket_id) > 0 THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Inactive' END AS customer_status FROM service_requests sr LEFT JOIN tickets t ON sr.request_id = t.request_id GROUP BY sr.customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT sr.customer_id, t.assignee_id FROM service_requests sr JOIN tickets t ON sr.request_id = t.request_id WHERE sr.customer_id <> t.assignee_id;
SELECT sr.request_id, sr.request_description, t.ticket_status, t.assignee_id FROM service_requests sr JOIN tickets t ON sr.request_id = t.request_id LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM service_requests;
SELECT request_id, customer_id FROM service_requests;
SELECT request_id, issue_description FROM service_requests;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, assigned_to_user_id FROM tickets;
SELECT * FROM resolutions;
SELECT resolution_id, ticket_id FROM resolutions;
SELECT resolution_id, resolution_timestamp FROM resolutions;
SELECT request_id, ticket_id, resolution_id FROM service_requests JOIN tickets ON service_requests.request_id = tickets.request_id JOIN resolutions ON tickets.ticket_id = resolutions.ticket_id;

SELECT request_id, ticket_id, resolution_id, resolution_notes FROM service_requests JOIN tickets ON service_requests.request_id = tickets.request_id JOIN resolutions ON tickets.ticket_id = resolutions.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM service_requests WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'open';
SELECT * FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT request_id, issue_description FROM service_requests WHERE request_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND request_timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status FROM tickets WHERE assigned_to_user_id = 456;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status FROM tickets WHERE request_id IN (SELECT request_id FROM service_requests WHERE customer_id = 789);
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM service_requests;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tickets;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM resolutions;
SELECT * FROM service_requests WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT request_id, issue_description FROM service_requests WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM request_timestamp) = 2022;
SELECT service_requests.request_id, service_requests.issue_description, tickets.ticket_status FROM service_requests INNER JOIN tickets ON service_requests.request_id = tickets.request_id;

SELECT s.request_id, s.issue_description, t.ticket_status, r.resolution_notes FROM service_requests s LEFT JOIN tickets t ON s.request_id = t.request_id LEFT JOIN resolutions r ON t.ticket_id = r.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM service_requests WHERE request_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND request_timestamp <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT s.customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_requests FROM service_requests s JOIN tickets t ON s.request_id = t.request_id GROUP BY s.customer_id;
SELECT MAX(request_timestamp) AS latest_request_time FROM service_requests;
SELECT r.ticket_id, r.resolution_timestamp, r.resolution_notes FROM resolutions r WHERE r.resolution_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND r.resolution_timestamp <= '2022-12-31';

SELECT s.request_id, s.issue_description, t.ticket_status, r.resolution_notes FROM service_requests s JOIN tickets t ON s.request_id = t.request_id LEFT JOIN resolutions r ON t.ticket_id = r.ticket_id WHERE t.assigned_to_user_id = 456;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(CAST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM request_timestamp) AS INT)) AS avg_request_time FROM service_requests GROUP BY customer_id;

SELECT request_id, issue_description FROM service_requests WHERE issue_description LIKE '%Critical%' AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM service_requests WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM request_timestamp) = 2022);
SELECT r.ticket_id, r.resolution_timestamp, r.resolution_notes FROM resolutions r WHERE r.resolution_notes ILIKE '%resolved%' ORDER BY r.resolution_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT s.customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT s.request_id) AS total_requests, COUNT(DISTINCT t.ticket_id) AS total_tickets FROM service_requests s LEFT JOIN tickets t ON s.request_id = t.request_id GROUP BY s.customer_id;
SELECT DISTINCT t.ticket_status, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM tickets t GROUP BY t.ticket_status HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (SELECT MAX(request_timestamp) FROM service_requests))) AS avg_request_time;
SELECT r.ticket_id, r.resolution_timestamp, r.resolution_notes FROM resolutions r WHERE r.resolution_timestamp >= (SELECT MIN(request_timestamp) FROM service_requests);
SELECT customer_id, AVG(CAST(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM request_timestamp) AS INT)) AS avg_request_time FROM service_requests WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM tickets);
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_requests FROM service_requests WHERE customer_id NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM tickets);
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_requests FROM service_requests GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3;
SELECT * FROM service_requests WHERE customer_id = ANY (SELECT customer_id FROM tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Resolved');
SELECT * FROM service_requests;
SELECT request_id, request_description, creation_date FROM service_requests;
SELECT * FROM tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status, ticket_description FROM tickets;
SELECT * FROM resolutions;
SELECT resolution_id, resolution_description, resolution_date FROM resolutions;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users;
SELECT * FROM service_requests JOIN tickets ON service_requests.request_id = tickets.request_id;
SELECT * FROM service_requests LEFT JOIN tickets ON service_requests.request_id = tickets.request_id;
SELECT * FROM service_requests RIGHT JOIN tickets ON service_requests.request_id = tickets.request_id;
SELECT * FROM service_requests INNER JOIN tickets ON service_requests.request_id = tickets.request_id;
SELECT * FROM tickets JOIN resolutions ON tickets.ticket_id = resolutions.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM tickets LEFT JOIN resolutions ON tickets.ticket_id = resolutions.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM tickets RIGHT JOIN resolutions ON tickets.ticket_id = resolutions.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM tickets INNER JOIN resolutions ON tickets.ticket_id = resolutions.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN tickets ON users.user_id = tickets.request_id;
SELECT * FROM users LEFT JOIN tickets ON users.user_id = tickets.request_id;
SELECT * FROM users RIGHT JOIN tickets ON users.user_id = tickets.request_id;
SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN tickets ON users.user_id = tickets.request_id;
SELECT * FROM service_requests;
SELECT * FROM tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'OPEN';
SELECT request_id, request_description FROM service_requests WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'IN PROGRESS';
SELECT request_id, ticket_description FROM tickets JOIN service_requests ON tickets.request_id = service_requests.request_id;
SELECT request_id, resolution_description FROM resolutions JOIN tickets ON resolutions.ticket_id = tickets.ticket_id;
SELECT users.username, tickets.ticket_status FROM tickets JOIN service_requests ON tickets.request_id = service_requests.request_id JOIN users ON service_requests.customer_id = users.user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM service_requests;
SELECT request_id, ticket_description FROM tickets WHERE ticket_description LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM service_requests);
SELECT request_id, ticket_description FROM tickets WHERE ticket_description IS NULL;
SELECT request_id, resolution_description FROM resolutions WHERE resolution_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'joh%';
SELECT request_id, ticket_status, creation_date FROM tickets JOIN service_requests ON tickets.request_id = service_requests.request_id WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT request_id, ticket_status, creation_date FROM tickets WHERE creation_date <= NOW() - INTERVAL '1 month';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(request_id) AS total_requests FROM service_requests GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT AVG(request_id) AS avg_request_id FROM service_requests;
SELECT ticket_status, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM tickets GROUP BY ticket_status;
SELECT username, COUNT(request_id) AS total_requests FROM service_requests JOIN users ON service_requests.customer_id = users.user_id GROUP BY username;
SELECT username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ticket_status, AVG(LENGTH(ticket_description)) AS avg_description_length FROM tickets GROUP BY ticket_status;
SELECT * FROM Requests;
SELECT request_description, requester_name FROM Requests;
SELECT DISTINCT requester_name FROM Requests;
SELECT request_description FROM Requests WHERE request_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT request_id, requester_name FROM Requests ORDER BY requester_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_priority > 3;
SELECT resolution_text FROM Resolutions WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT username FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT department_name FROM Departments WHERE department_id = 1;
SELECT department_name FROM Departments WHERE department_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id FROM Users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT ticket_id, resolution_text FROM Tickets JOIN Resolutions ON Tickets.ticket_id = Resolutions.ticket_id;
SELECT requester_name, ticket_status FROM Requests JOIN Tickets ON Requests.request_id = Tickets.request_id;
SELECT r.request_id, t.ticket_id, re.resolution_id FROM Requests r JOIN Tickets t ON r.request_id = t.request_id JOIN Resolutions re ON t.ticket_id = re.ticket_id;
SELECT u.username, d.department_name FROM Users u JOIN Departments d ON u.user_id = d.department_id;
SELECT t.ticket_id, r.resolution_text, d.department_name FROM Tickets t JOIN Resolutions r ON t.ticket_id = r.ticket_id JOIN Departments d ON t.ticket_id = d.department_id;
SELECT u.username, t.ticket_status, r.resolution_text FROM Users u JOIN Tickets t ON u.user_id = t.request_id JOIN Resolutions r ON t.ticket_id = r.ticket_id;
SELECT u.username, t.ticket_status, r.resolution_text FROM Users u, Tickets t, Resolutions r WHERE u.user_id = t.request_id AND t.ticket_id = r.ticket_id;
SELECT request_id, request_description, requester_name, request_date FROM Requests;
SELECT * FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Open';
SELECT resolution_text, resolution_date FROM Resolutions WHERE resolution_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT request_id, request_description, requester_name, request_date FROM Requests WHERE request_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT request_id, request_description, requester_name, request_date FROM Requests ORDER BY request_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, ticket_status, ticket_priority FROM Tickets WHERE ticket_status = 'Closed';
SELECT resolution_text, resolution_date FROM Resolutions WHERE resolution_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT resolution_id, resolution_text, resolution_date FROM Resolutions WHERE resolution_text LIKE '%resolved%';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM Users JOIN Departments ON user_id = department_id;
SELECT * FROM Requests JOIN Tickets ON Requests.request_id = Tickets.request_id;
SELECT * FROM Users LEFT JOIN Tickets ON Users.user_id = Tickets.request_id;
SELECT u.username, d.department_name FROM Users u JOIN Departments d ON u.user_id = d.department_id;
SELECT t.ticket_id, r.resolution_text FROM Tickets t JOIN Resolutions r ON t.ticket_id = r.ticket_id;
SELECT * FROM Requests CROSS JOIN Tickets;
SELECT request_id, COUNT(ticket_id) AS num_tickets FROM Requests LEFT JOIN Tickets ON Requests.request_id = Tickets.request_id GROUP BY request_id;
SELECT u.username, COUNT(t.ticket_id) AS num_tickets FROM Users u LEFT JOIN Tickets t ON u.user_id = t.request_id GROUP BY u.username;
SELECT request_id, AVG(ticket_priority) AS avg_priority FROM Tickets GROUP BY request_id;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(u.user_id) AS num_users FROM Departments JOIN Users u ON Departments.department_id = u.user_id GROUP BY department_name;
